heading: Meme Currency Makes Millionaire
body: There once was a young boy who made his millions by investing in the illustrious cryptocurrency, dogecoin and other interesting currencies. The money started running out and the boy had to sell a prized racing yacht to cover his debts. Someone from out of town who wanted to buy the yacht made a quick offer, but the boy's father refused to sell it. He said
The young man then responded, "I am so serious, I'll buy it with cryptocurrency" The offer was accepted and so the race yacht, The Sailing Doge, was sold for the equivalent of $100, 000, 000.
